welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
# node-trackmania.io
A Node.js inplementation of Trackmania Live services ([trackmania.io](https://trackmania.io))

[![Trackmania.io icon](https://trackmania.io/img/square.png)](https://trackmania.io)

![Trackmania.io API](https://img.shields.io/website?down_message=Offline&label=Trackmania.io%20API&up_message=Online&url=https%3A%2F%2Ftrackmania.io)
[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/276076890714800129?color=%23FF309A&label=Discord&logo=discord&logoColor=%23FF309A)](https://openplanet.nl/link/discord)

[![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/trackmania.io.png?downloads=true&stars=true)](https://npmjs.org/trackmania.io)

![GitHub package.json version](https://img.shields.io/github/package-json/v/GreepTheSheep/node-trackmania.io?logo=npm)
![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/dw/trackmania.io?logo=npm)
![NPM](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/trackmania.io)

![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/GreepTheSheep/node-trackmania.io?logo=github)
![GitHub pull requests](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-pr/GreepTheSheep/node-trackmania.io?logo=github)

![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/GreepTheSheep/node-trackmania.io?logo=github&style=flat-square)
![GitHub forks](https://img.shields.io/github/forks/GreepTheSheep/node-trackmania.io?style=flat-square)

---

## Disclaimer - [Can I use the Trackmania.io API for my own project?](https://openplanet.nl/tmio/api)

[Please read this topic](https://openplanet.nl/tmio/api)

*The User Agent Header will be automatically set to your project directory name, with your current file name included*

*Most data that you'll request **is not cached!**, do your part to cache stuff and try not to do bulk requests!*

**You are responsible for the program you code, if you are banned from the API don't blame the wrapper or trackmania.io, blame yourself!**

If you're still unsure about your use of the API, feel free to DM Miss#8888 with any further questions.

---
## Contributing

Please see the [CONTRIBUTING.md file](CONTRIBUTING.md)

---
## Discussion

If you want to talk about this project or just for saying hi, Join the [Openplanet Discord Server](https://openplanet.nl/link/discord), in the #trackmania-io channel

---
## Thanks

Thanks to [@codecat](https://github.com/codecat) for creating trackmania.io and for helping me with their API *(and updating it everytime)*.

Thanks to Nadeo (Trackmania's studio) for giving an API to trackmania.io.

Thanks to [@dassschaf](https://github.com/dassschaf) and [@stefan-baumann](https://github.com/stefan-baumann) for chat formatting remover code in regex *(it saves my life)*

Thanks to [@Flirno](https://github.com/Flirno) for player COTD results API

Thanks to [@jonese1234](https://github.com/jonese1234) for the dataset to get the players searching

props.name: ratelimit
props.description: Get the ratelimits details on trackmania.io.

methods.name: _apiReq
methods.description: Do an API request

params.name: method
params.description: The HTTP method to use (Default: GET)

returns.description: A promise that resolves to the API response

methods.name: setUserAgent
methods.description:
Sets a User Agent for your project.
Required if you run a important project.

params.name: useragent
params.description: The User Agent to set to.

methods.name: setAPIKey
methods.description:
Sets an API Key.
Required if you run a important project. It will triple the rate limit.

params.name: key
params.description: The full API key. It must contains "yourname:theactualsecretkey"

classes.name: ClientRatelimit
classes.description: The ratelimit details of the client.

props.name: ratelimit
props.description:
The total number of requests you can make on trackmania.io API.
If null, it means you haven't actually done a request

props.name: remaining
props.description:
The number of requests you can make before the ratelimit resets.
If null, it means you haven't actually done a request

props.name: reset
props.description:
The date when the ratelimit resets.
If null, it means you haven't actually done a request

classes.name: CacheManager
classes.description: The Cache Manager is responsible for managing the cache.

params.name: from
params.description: The class that instants this manager.

params.name: to
params.description: The class this manager will operate on.

props.name: to
props.description: The class this manager will operate on.

props.name: _ttl
props.description: The time to live for the cache in miliseconds.

methods.name: _reset
methods.description: Resets the cache based on the ttl.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Fetches a Trackmania campaign and returns its data

params.name: clubId
params.description: The club Id that the campaign belongs to (If it's an official campaign, set it to 0)

params.name: cache
params.description: Whether to get the campaign from cache or not

methods.name: _fetch
methods.description: Fetches a campaign and returns its data

params.name: clubId
params.description: The club Id that the campaign belongs to

params.name: cache
params.description: Whether to cache the campaign or not

methods.name: _fetch
methods.description: Fetches a map and returns its data

params.name: cache
params.description: Whether to cache the club or not

methods.name: get
methods.description: Fetches a Trackmania event and returns its data

params.name: page
params.description: The page, each page contains 12 items

params.name: cache
params.description: Whether to get the list from cache or not

methods.name: _fetch
methods.description: Fetches a event and returns its data

params.name: cache
params.description: Whether to cache the list or not

props.name: client
props.description: The client that created this request

classes.name: Campaign
classes.description: The Campaign class represents a campaign.

props.name: client
props.description: The client object of the campaign.

props.name: image
props.description: The image URL of the campaign. If this is an official campaign, the decal image URL is returned.

props.name: createdAt
props.description: The creation date of the campaign.

props.name: updatedAt
props.description: The last update date of the campaign.

props.name: leaderboardId
props.description: The leaderboard id of the campaign.

props.name: media
props.description: The media images of the campaign, if this is an official campaign.

methods.name: club
methods.description: The club that owns the campaign.

methods.name: maps
methods.description: The list of maps in the campaign.

classes.name: Club
classes.description: The Club class represents a club in Trackmania.

props.name: client
props.description: The client object of the club

props.name: screens
props.description: The club screens URL. Imares are in DDS format, except the sponsor 4x1 that may be in PNG.

methods.name: creator
methods.description: The club creator player

methods.name: fetchMembers
methods.description: The club members (Members are sorted by role and club interaction time.)

params.name: cache
params.description: Whether to cache the result (default: true)

methods.name: fetchActivities
methods.description: The club activities

params.name: cache
params.description: Whether to cache the result (default: true)

classes.name: ClubMember
classes.description: Represents a club member (player) in the club

props.name: joinDate
props.description: The join date on the club

props.name: isCreator
props.description: Whether the member is a club creator

props.name: isAdmin
props.description: Whether the member is a club admin

props.name: isVip
props.description: Whether the member is a vip

methods.name: member
methods.description: The member

classes.name: ClubActivity
classes.description: Represents a club activity in the club

props.name: isPublic
props.description: Whether the activity is a public activity

props.name: isPasswordProtected
props.description: Whether the activity is password protected

methods.name: campaign
methods.description: If the activity is a campaign, returns the campaign object of the activity

methods.name: room
methods.description: If the activity is a room, returns the room object of the activity

props.name: players
props.description: The number of players in this COTD

props.name: startDate
props.description: The start date of this COTD

props.name: endDate
props.description: The end date of this COTD

methods.name: event
methods.description: The event associated on this COTD

classes.name: MatchmakingDivision
classes.description: Represents a division in the matchmaking system.

props.name: typeName
props.description: The type name of the division

props.name: rule
props.description: The rule identifier of this division

props.name: minPoints
props.description: The minimum points to the division

props.name: maxPoints
props.description: The maximum points to the division

props.name: image
props.description: The image of the division. If Royal, the crown

props.name: lion
props.description: The Royal Lion image of the division

props.name: client
props.description: The client object of the news page

props.name: _data
props.description: The data of the news page

props.name: link
props.description: The link to the news item on trackmania.com

props.name: media
props.description: The news item's accompanying media file as a link

props.name: time
props.description: The news item's time of publishing

props.name: client
props.description: The client object of the player

props.name: id
props.description: The account ID of the player

props.name: name
props.description: The display name of the player

props.name: timestamp
props.description: The timestamps of the player's first login

props.name: clubTag
props.description: The club tag of the player (non-formatted)

props.name: lastClubTagChange
props.description: The last change of the player's club tag

props.name: zone
props.description: The player's zone data with the ranking of the player in the zone

methods.name: _constructZoneArray
methods.description: Constructs an array of the zone of the player

methods.name: matchmaking
methods.description: The player's matchmaking data

params.name: type
params.description: The type of matchmaking data to return ('3v3' / 'Royal') (defaults to '3v3')

classes.name: PlayerTrophies
classes.description: Represents the trophies of a player

props.name: lastChange
props.description: The last time the player got a trophy

props.name: echelon
props.description: The echelon level of the player

props.name: trophies
props.description: The number of trophies the player has

props.name: history
props.description: The last 25 trophies gains of the player

methods.name: trophy
methods.description: The number of trophies the player has
examples:
// Get number of trophy 5 (aka silver 2 trophy)
player.trophies.trophy(5);

classes.name: PlayerTrophyHistory
classes.description: Represents the history of a player's trophies

props.name: trophies
props.description: The number of trophies the player has

methods.name: trophy
methods.description: The number of trophies the player has
examples:
// Get number of trophy 5 (aka silver 2 trophy) on the latest gain
player.trophies.history[0].trophy(5);

methods.name: map
methods.description: The map where the achievement was earned (if any)

classes.name: PlayerTrophyAchievementType
classes.description: Represents the type of an achievement

props.name: type
props.description: Gets the type of the achievement

props.name: id
props.description: Gets the ID of the achievement

props.name: soloRankingType
props.description: Gets the solo ranking achievement type (if the type is SoloRanking)

props.name: soloRankingSeasonId
props.description: Gets the solo ranking season ID (if the type is SoloRanking)

props.name: competitionId
props.description: Gets the competition id (if the type is CompetitionRanking)

props.name: competitionName
props.description: Gets the competition name (if the type is CompetitionRanking)

props.name: competitionStage
props.description: Gets the competition stage (if the type is CompetitionRanking)

props.name: competitionStageStep
props.description: Gets the competition stage step (if the type is CompetitionRanking)

props.name: competitionType
props.description: Gets the competition type (if the type is CompetitionRanking)

props.name: soloMedalType
props.description: Gets the Solo Medal type (if the type is SoloMedal)

props.name: soloMedalLevel
props.description: Gets the solo medal level (if the type is SoloMedal)

props.name: liveMatchServerId
props.description: Gets the server ID of the Live Match (if the type is LiveMatch)

props.name: liveMatchGameMode
props.description: Gets the game mode of the Live Match (if the type is LiveMatch)

props.name: liveMatchDuration
props.description: Gets the duration of the Live Match in seconds (if the type is LiveMatch)

props.name: liveMatchRank
props.description: Gets the rank of the Live Match (if the type is LiveMatch)

props.name: liveMatchTrophyRank
props.description: Gets the trophy rank of the Live Match (if the type is LiveMatch)

props.name: client
props.description: The client object of the player

props.name: image
props.description: The image URL of the echelon

props.name: vanity
props.description: The vanity name of the player, if the player has one, otherwise null

props.name: youtube
props.description: The youtube link of the player, if the player has one, otherwise null

props.name: twitter
props.description: The twitter link of the player, if the player has one, otherwise null

props.name: twitch
props.description: The twitch channel link of the player, if the player has one, otherwise null

props.name: displayURL
props.description: The display URL of the player

classes.name: PlayerMatchmaking
classes.description: Represents a player's stats in matchmaking

params.name: type
params.description: The type of matchmaking. (3v3 or Royal)

props.name: _data
props.description: The raw data of the player's matchmaking data based on the type

props.name: type
props.description: The type name of the matchmaking

props.name: typeId
props.description: The type ID of the matchmaking

props.name: rank
props.description: The rank of the player on this matchmaking

props.name: score
props.description: The MMR rank of the player on this matchmaking (score)

props.name: progression
props.description: The progression of the player on this matchmaking (can be number of wins for Royal, or score for 3v3)

props.name: division
props.description: The division of the player on this matchmaking

props.name: _MatchmakingDivision
props.description: The division of the player on this matchmaking

props.name: history
props.description: The history of recent matches on this matchmaking

classes.name: PlayerMatchmakingMatchResult
classes.description: Represents a player's matchmaking match result

props.name: win
props.description: The player has win the match

props.name: leave
props.description: The player has leaved the match

props.name: mvp
props.description: The player is the most valuable player in the match

props.name: startDate
props.description: The start date of the match

props.name: afterScore
props.description: The score of the player after this match

props.name: rank
props.description: The overall rank on the COTD

props.name: divisionRank
props.description: The division rank on the COTD

props.name: totalPlayers
props.description: The total number of players of the COTD

props.name: bestPrimary
props.description: The best stats in the primary COTD

props.name: _bestprimary
props.description: The best stats in the primary COTD

props.name: bestOverall
props.description: The best stats in all COTDs (including reruns)

props.name: _bestoverall
props.description: The best stats in all COTDs (including reruns)

props.name: totalWins
props.description: The total COTD wins in division 1

props.name: totalDivWins
props.description: The total COTD wins in any divison

props.name: averageDivRank
props.description: Average div rank (in any division), float between 0 and 1

props.name: divWinStreak
props.description: The win streak in any division

classes.name: PlayerCOTDStatsBest
classes.description: Represents a player's COTD stats best stats

props.name: rankInDivision
props.description: The best rank in a division

props.name: rankInDivisionDate
props.description: The best rank in a division date

props.name: divisionOfRankInDivision
props.description: The division who got the best rank in a division

props.name: client
props.description: The client that instantiated this room

props.name: isCloud
props.description: Whether this room is hosted on the cloud (Nadeo)

props.name: login
props.description: The login of the room (if it's not a cloud room)

props.name: playerCount
props.description: The number of players in the room

props.name: maxPlayersCount
props.description: The maximum number of players in the room

props.name: region
props.description: The region of the room (if it's on a cloud room)

props.name: script
props.description: The script name that currently runs in the room

props.name: scriptSettings
props.description: The script settings on the room

props.name: imageUrl
props.description: The image URL of the room

methods.name: club
methods.description: The club that this room belongs to

methods.name: maps
methods.description: The maps on the room

props.name: size
props.description: The number of players in the event.

methods.name: creator
methods.description: The creator of the event.

classes.name: TMEventRound
classes.description: Represents a round in a TMEvent.

methods.name: challenges

params.name: cache

methods.name: _fetchChallenge
methods.description: Fetches the round's challenges.

params.name: index
params.description: The index of the challenge to fetch.

params.name: cache
params.description: Wether to cache the challenges or not.

classes.name: TMEventChallengeResult

methods.name: player
